mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.xxbh AS "xxbh", a.nf AS "nf", a.lb AS "lb", a.sfzh AS "sfzh", a.ksh AS "ksh", a.xm AS "xm", a.xbdm AS "xbdm", a.lqzy AS "lqzy", a.lqzyok AS "lqzyok", a.ntzzy AS "ntzzy", a.lxdh AS "lxdh", a.csny AS "csny", a.zzmmdm AS "zzmmdm", a.mzdm AS "mzdm", a.kslbdm AS "kslbdm", a.bylbdm AS "bylbdm", a.zxdm AS "zxdm", a.zxmc AS "zxmc", a.dqdm AS "dqdm", a.jtdz AS "jtdz", a.yzbm AS "yzbm", a.kstc AS "kstc", a.ksjlhcf AS "ksjlhcf", a.sjr AS "sjr", a.tdcj AS "tdcj", a.tdzy AS "tdzy", a.yw AS "yw", a.sx AS "sx", a.wy AS "wy", a.zhw AS "zhw", a.zhl AS "zhl", a.mk AS "mk", a.mscj AS "mscj", a.mszhcj AS "mszhcj", a.xy AS "xy", a.xz AS "xz", a.lp AS "lp", a.pc AS "pc", a.sf AS "sf", a.memo AS "memo", a.jcsj AS "jcsj", a.ems AS "ems", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.updatetime AS "updatetime", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_cjcx( owid, xxbh, nf, lb, sfzh, ksh, xm, xbdm, lqzy, lqzyok, ntzzy, lxdh, csny, zzmmdm, mzdm, kslbdm, bylbdm, zxdm, zxmc, dqdm, jtdz, yzbm, kstc, ksjlhcf, sjr, tdcj, tdzy, yw, sx, wy, zhw, zhl, mk, mscj, mszhcj, xy, xz, lp, pc, sf, memo, jcsj, ems, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, createtime, creator, creator_name, updatetime, updator, updator_name ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{xxbh}, #{nf}, #{lb}, #{sfzh}, #{ksh}, #{xm}, #{xbdm}, #{lqzy}, #{lqzyok}, #{ntzzy}, #{lxdh}, #{csny}, #{zzmmdm}, #{mzdm}, #{kslbdm}, #{bylbdm}, #{zxdm}, #{zxmc}, #{dqdm}, #{jtdz}, #{yzbm}, #{kstc}, #{ksjlhcf}, #{sjr}, #{tdcj}, #{tdzy}, #{yw}, #{sx}, #{wy}, #{zhw}, #{zhl}, #{mk}, #{mscj}, #{mszhcj}, #{xy}, #{xz}, #{lp}, #{pc}, #{sf}, #{memo}, #{jcsj}, #{ems}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{updatetime}, #{updator}, #{updatorName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_cjcx SET owid = #{owid}, xxbh = #{xxbh}, nf = #{nf}, lb = #{lb}, sfzh = #{sfzh}, ksh = #{ksh}, xm = #{xm}, xbdm = #{xbdm}, lqzy = #{lqzy}, lqzyok = #{lqzyok}, ntzzy = #{ntzzy}, lxdh = #{lxdh}, csny = #{csny}, zzmmdm = #{zzmmdm}, mzdm = #{mzdm}, kslbdm = #{kslbdm}, bylbdm = #{bylbdm}, zxdm = #{zxdm}, zxmc = #{zxmc}, dqdm = #{dqdm}, jtdz = #{jtdz}, yzbm = #{yzbm}, kstc = #{kstc}, ksjlhcf = #{ksjlhcf}, sjr = #{sjr}, tdcj = #{tdcj}, tdzy = #{tdzy}, yw = #{yw}, sx = #{sx}, wy = #{wy}, zhw = #{zhw}, zhl = #{zhl}, mk = #{mk}, mscj = #{mscj}, mszhcj = #{mszhcj}, xy = #{xy}, xz = #{xz}, lp = #{lp}, pc = #{pc}, sf = #{sf}, memo = #{memo}, jcsj = #{jcsj}, ems = #{ems}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName} WHERE owid = #{owid}
